intro: Meconopsis brachynema, commonly known as the dwarf meconopsis, is a herbaceous perennial plant native to the mountainous regions of Central Asia. It belongs to the Papaveraceae family, which includes poppies and other flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its delicate, blue or purple flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer.
